name: caprover
description: CapRover is a one-click app deployment and server management solution that works like Heroku. It runs on Docker and makes it easy to deploy web apps, databases, and static sites using a web UI and CLI.
features: One-Click Deployment: Deploy apps like Heroku with simple commands. Effortless hosting.
Docker-Based: Built on Docker for reliable containerization. Modern infrastructure.
Web UI & CLI: Manage deployments through browser or command line. Flexible control.
App Templates: Pre-configured templates for popular apps and databases. Quick setup.
Automatic SSL: Free HTTPS certificates with Let's Encrypt integration. Secure by default.
Load Balancing: Built-in load balancing for high availability. Scale easily.
Self-Hosted: Run your own PaaS on any server. Complete control.
